subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Steelers coach Mike Tomlin, 35, and Lane Kiffin, who became the youngest head coach in modern N.F.L. history when the Raiders hired him at age 31, make their debuts on Sunday.
snippet: Steelers coach Mike Tomlin, 35, and Lane Kiffin, who became the youngest head coach in modern N.F.L. history when the Raiders hired him at age 31, make their debuts on Sunday.
